goal.en: “The objective of this Inorganic Chemistry Laboratory is to more understand the inorganic chemistry by performing some experiments. The laboratory courses cover basic and practice experiments,and incldse most of contents taught in course of Inorganic Chemistry.“
goal.ch: “本實驗課程的目標是讓同學能學習新的實驗技巧，與使用新穎的儀器設備。 並接觸到不同類別或具潛在運用的化合物與化學反應。 課程進度配合無機化學教學內容，以使學生瞭解無機化學實驗方法。 並介紹現代最新的實驗發展和應用，並讓學生瞭解課程安排與當前科技材料之發展的相關性， 進而增加學生對這些基礎課程的興趣，並奠定良好的基礎。“

content.en:
“Eleven experiments will be performed in this laboratory Course.
1. The preparation, characterization and studies of linkage isomers .
2. The properties of some copper(II) complexes.
3. The five-coordinated vanadium-oxo complexes.
4. The molecular oxygen cobalt complexes.
5. Inorganic heterocyclic six-membered derivatives.
6. Inorganic chelating polymers.
7. Liquid crystalline copper(II) complexes.
8. Super conductors of metal complexes.“
content.ch:
“實驗一：聯結異構物之製備、鑑定與分析
實驗二：錯合物氧化銅的特性
實驗三：五配位金屬釩氧錯合物：[VO(acac)2
實驗四：具分子氧結構之鈷錯合物
實驗五：無機雜環六氯環三磷?及其苯胺衍生物
實驗六：無機螯環分子：雙磷胺硫配位基及其金屬錯合物
實驗七：含過渡金屬中心二價銅之桿狀液晶材料
實驗八：釔鋇銅氧高溫超導體之製備
實驗十：含銥金屬之有機發光二極體材料
實驗十一：二鹵化物磷鎳的錯合物“

textbook.en: “Textbook: “Inorganic Chemistry”, 4th Ed, 2011, by G. L. Miessler ＆ D. A. Tarr References: 1. Inorganic Chemistry, 3rd. Ed., 2008, by C. E. Housecroft ＆ A. G. Shappre 2. Advanced Inorganic Chemistry, 6th Ed., 1999, by F. Albert Cotton, John Wiley ＆ Sons, Inc., New York. 3. Concepts and Models of Inorganic Chemistry, 3rd Ed., 1994, by B. Douglas, John Wiley ＆ Sons, Inc., New York.“
textbook.ch: “(教科書) Textbook: “Inorganic Chemistry”, 4th Ed, 2011, by G. L. Miessler ＆ D. A. Tarr (參考書) References: 1. Inorganic Chemistry, 3rd. Ed., 2008, by C. E. Housecroft ＆ A. G. Shappre 2. Advanced Inorganic Chemistry, 6th Ed., 1999, by F. Albert Cotton, John Wiley ＆ Sons, Inc., New York. 3. Concepts and Models of Inorganic Chemistry, 3rd Ed., 1994, by B. Douglas, John Wiley ＆ Sons, Inc., New“

grading.ch: “實驗實做技巧與態度、實驗報告撰寫、及期末考試 實驗報告：50 ％ 實驗精神：出席狀況、?與考論、與實驗態度等 (25 ％) 學期評量：實驗前分組報告與期末考 (25 ％)“
